champ.champInfo:
The management of the competition is carried out by the Department of Education, Youth and Sports of the Mukachiv City Executive Committee (hereinafter - the Department) and the public organization "Ukrainian Federation of Kyokushinkaikan Karate" (hereinafter - the Federation).
Responsibility for the preparation and direct holding of the tournament rests with the Mukachevo Kyokushin Karate Youth Club "Hawk".
Chief judge of the competition - Dmytro Leonidovych Volynets, 5 dan, Lutsk, chairman of the board of the Ukrainian Federation "Kyokushinkaikan Karate", Branch Chief of Ukraine.

The competition will be held from October 27-28, 2023 at the address: Dukhnovycha Street, 93, Mukachevo, Zakarpattia Oblast, 89600, ДЮСШ

Registration of tournament participants takes place through a personal account on the website https://www.alliance-kumite.net

Phone numbers for preliminary applications: Ihor Tatarchenko - +38(067) 788 77 28;

Program

  • 08:00-09:00 weighing of competitors
  • 09:00-09:30 judges' seminar
  • 09:30-12:00 preliminary matches (up to the semi-finals)
  • 12:00-13:00 ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 13:00-17:00 semi-final and final matches
  • 17:00-19:00 awarding of winners, closing of competitions, departure of competition participants

Competition participants

National teams of regions and the city of Kyiv are allowed to participate in the competition. The composition of the team is not limited. Each team must provide a referee to ensure qualified refereeing.

Tournament rules

Athletes in the age groups of 4-17 years participate in the competition and compete in separate groups according to the Olympic system or the round system Protective accessories: groin bandage, helmet for children, pads on shins and hands, chest bandage for girls.
Charity contribution for participation in competitions:

  • Kumite section - 650 UAH.
  • Fine for not being part of the judge's team 300 UAH.

Categories KUMITE men

  • _U5 : categories will be formed taking into account the submitted applications
  • _U7 : -20, -25, -30, +30
  • _U9 : -25, -30, -35, -40, +40
  • U11 : -30, -35, -40, -45, -50, +50
  • U13 : -40, -45, -50, -55, +55
  • U15 : -50, -55, -60, -65, +65
  • U17: -60, -65, -70, +70

Categories of KUMITE women

  • _U5 : categories will be formed taking into account the submitted applications
  • _U7 : -20, -25, -30, +30
  • _U9 : -25, -30, -35, -40, +40
  • U11 : -30, -35, +35
  • U13 : -40, -45, +45
  • U15: -45, -50, +50
  • U17: -55, -60, +60

Regulations of previous matches:

  • U5: 1.0 min, 1.0 min
  • U7: 1.0 min, 1.0 min
  • U9-U13: 1.5 min, 1.0 min
  • U15: 2.0 min, 1.0 min
  • U17: 2.0 min, 1.5 min

The regulation of semi-final and final matches:

  • U7: 1.0 min, 1.0 min, weighing (difference in weight 1.5 kg), 1.0 min
  • U9-U13: 1.5 min, 1.0 min, weighing (difference in weight 2.0 kg), 1.0 min
  • U15: 2.0 min, 1.0 min, , weighing (difference in weight 3.0 kg), 1.0 min
  • U17: 2.0 min, 1.5 min, weighing (difference in weight 5.0 kg), 1.5 min

Rewarding

  • Athletes who won prizes are awarded diplomas of relevant degrees, medals and cups
